weka.core.converters

接口 BatchConverter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ArffLoader, ArffSaver, C45Loader, C45Saver, CSVLoader, CSVSaver, DatabaseLoader, DatabaseSaver, LibSVMLoader, LibSVMSaver, SerializedInstancesLoader, SerializedInstancesSaver, SVMLightLoader, SVMLightSaver, TextDirectoryLoader, XRFFLoader, XRFFSaver

    public interface BatchConverter
    Marker interface for a loader/saver that can retrieve instances in batch mode
    版本:
    $Revision 1.0 $
    作者:
    Mark Hall
